resources.string: ChatGPT or My ChatBot, which stands for Chat Generative Pre-trained Transformer, is a large language modelâ€“based chatbot developed by OpenAI and launched on November 30, 2022.

Chat bot error message 

 A chat-bot error message, also known as a fallback error response or failure message, is triggered when the chat-bot does't understand the user's question.
So if such condition occur please calm yourself and Please ask the question again.
